1.title: London Districts: Shooters Hill
1.plot: A documentary on the London district of Shooters Hill, narrated by Dewyne Lindsay. It forms part of the 'London Districts' series which dissects the different boroughs of London to explore both historical and modern life within its constituent areas through an assortment of facts, advice and local anecdotes.

imdb.title: London Districts
plot: _London Districts_ (qv) is a series of short films exploring the districts of London. It delves into the historical backgrounds to discover how they came to be and collectively informs the viewer on contemporary things to do in London.
